title: average unranked queue time for ADC?
body: I just transferred from NA to the oceanic server and have queued for my first unranked game on the server attempting to play as an ADC. So far 20 mins in the queue and still waiting.... Is this normal?

replies.body:
Yeah I'm only relatively new to the game, started playing about a month ago.

Would it be worthwhile to transfer back once I hit max level to play ranked down the track or are wait times still long in ranked?
Low ELO queue times are fine, mid ELO I hear it's alright but high ELO is bad from what I've heard.
Thanks for the help mate, appreciate it! Back to NA for now I think!
Team Builder at the best of times takes 8-10 minutes. Normally 30+ mins. Don't bother.
Teambuilder on OCE is not gonna get you anything. If you are living in America, you are just losing out from transferring here.
If you're queuing for ADC I'm assuming you're using Teambuilder, in which case I'd give up. TB queues are ridiculously long on OCE.

DID YOU KNOW THIS GAMES CRIT INPUTS CAN BE HACKED BY PEOPLE? YOUR CRITS ARENT RANDOM. THE QUEUES/MATCHMAKING AREN'T RANDOM. ITS A BLATANTLY BAD CONSPIRACY BY A CRIMINAL CORPORATION THAT HARBORS LAW BREAKERS
